name: Phase Maze
description:
Welcome to Phase Maze.

This game was made from the University of Utah students in our Traditional Game Development class. 

Contributors and creators

Programmer

  • Brendon Parkinson
  • Sangyoon Cho

Artist

  • Austin Freestone
  • Jason Chang 
  • Seongmin Kim(VFX)
  • Xuanhao Mei
  • Kaili Yan

You will play as our water droplet friend, Dewy as you transform into different states of water to complete the maze going through fans, grates, pressing buttons, and much much more in this colorful themed game. 

Enjoy and please leave us some feedback.
